name: Onitama
short_description: A chess-like strategy game where players use shared movement cards to control their pieces on a 5x5 board.

name: Boop
short_description: A light strategy game where players place cat tokens on a bed, aiming to line up three in a row to score.

name: Merv
short_description: A game set in the ancient city of Merv, focusing on resource management, trading, and defending against invasions.

name: Ahoy
short_description: A pirate-themed strategy game where players control ships, explore islands, and engage in naval battles.

name: Cubitos
short_description: A racing game where players roll dice to move along a track, with various powers and abilities to gain an edge.

name: The Crew
short_description: A cooperative trick-taking game set in space where players complete missions by working together.

name: Celtic
short_description: A family-friendly strategy game with Celtic themes where players gather resources and complete quests.

name: Crystal Cave
short_description: A puzzle game where players explore caves, collect crystals, and solve challenges to score points.

name: Demeter
short_description: A roll-and-write game set on a distant planet where players research dinosaurs and develop their stations.

name: Merlin
short_description: A medieval strategy game where players use dice to control knights and Merlin to complete various tasks.

name: Sewer Pirats
short_description: A game where players lead pirate animals in a race to gather the most valuable trash from the sewers.
